name: Fun Monster Painting - 8 x 10 Print
description:
This is a cute, vibrant monster print of an original painting. =) I painted this mixed-media design on canvas using acrylic paint, old book pages, mod-podge, india ink, and hand-stitching. He's sure to bring a smile to your face and brighten up your child's room or your craft area - or wherever it is that monsters live in your house!

The print is 8 x 10, printed at 8.25 x 10.25 (due to its yellow scalloped border) and has a larger white border around the edge to allow for easy framing. The colors are very vibrant, and it's printed professionally on 60lb. matte paper. Signed and dated on the back. The watermark is not on the final piece. =)

This item is shipped to you in a 9 x 12 bend-proof envelope, in a clear plastic sleeve.

The quoted Canadian shipping price is for Eastern Canada, if you live in Western Canada (BC or Alberta) the shipping price will be a few dollars less and the difference will be promptly refunded after the order has processed. Please allow 10-14 days for ground delivery to the United states. Thank you!

If combined shipping seems odd, it might just be. I'll happily refund you any difference in actual shipping cost once the sale is complete and on its way to you.

Thanks for peeking!

name: Monster House 8 x 10 Print
description:
This is a cute, vibrant monster print for anyone who wants to visit a monster town but doesn't live close enough. =) I drew the scene on paper and then scanned it into Photoshop, and used commercial textures and paint to color it digitally. 

The print is 8 x 10, printed at 8.5 x 10.5 to allow a border for easy framing. The colors are very vibrant, and it's printed professionally on 60lb. matte paper. Signed and dated on the back. The watermark is not on the final piece. =)

This item is shipped to you in a 9 x 12 bend-proof envelope, in a clear plastic sleeve. 

The quoted Canadian shipping price is for Eastern Canada, if you live in Western Canada (BC or Alberta) the shipping price will be a few dollars less and the difference will be promptly refunded after the order has processed. Please allow 10-14 days for ground delivery to the United states. Thank you!

If combined shipping seems odd, it might just be. I'll happily refund you any difference in actual shipping cost once the sale is complete and on its way to you.

Thanks for peeking!

name: Printed Monster Cards - 'Thanks' Set of 4
description:
Monsters love people! And not just because of their juicy goodness - because they are just super-loveable furry little beings here to spread joy and make you smile. Or, at least these Bubbly Shnooks monsters are. So who better to pass the message along?

This set of 4 professionally printed, 4 x 5 inch cards is the best way to make sure your sweet nothings and messages of gratefulness get through without a hitch.

This set comes with 2 designs each of 2 cards; Two yellow "thanks!" cards, and two orange "thanks!" cards. They come with coordinating bright blue envelopes, and the middles of all the cards are blank - lots of space to write some personalized lovely goodness! They're perfect as fun 'thank-you's' after receiving gifts, to send to party attendees, or just to say 'hi'! 

These cards are not printed on a home printer; they're printed at a professional print shop on heavy white cardstock. I cut, fold, and pack them all by myself. They were designed using my original pencil drawings and painted/textured in photoshop. They come with 4 Celestial Blue A2 Astrobright envelopes, and live here in a smoke-free environment.

If you'd like these customized or are interested in wholesale, please contact me!

If combined shipping seems odd, it might just be. I'll happily refund you any difference in actual shipping cost once the sale is complete and on its way to you. 

Thanks for peeking!

name: Monster of a Notepad - Lucy in Love
description:
Who's a complusive list-maker? Me, me! I hope you are, too, because this Monster of a notepad is perfect for writing down all those random thoughts, shopping lists, or anything you need to jot down in a hurry! Plus - wouldn't it make you smile holding lovely Lucy the heart-holding monster as you walk down the cereal isle?

This notepad was illustrated and digitally colored by myself, and it weighs in at 4.25 x 5.5 inches, with 50 full-color sheets. The back is a sturdy chipboard piece, and it was printed and bound by a very helpful professional third-party printer (if I could do it myself, I totally would!). =) The center is lightly lined with a yellow ledger-like paper, and the colors are so fun and vibrant!

Wholesale is available for this item, and I can put an order together for you if you'd like more than one, as well - just convo me! 

If combined shipping seems odd, it might just be. I'll happily refund you any difference in actual shipping cost once the sale is complete and on its way to you. 

Thanks for peeking!
